desc.html: Spatial extent of the Indus Valley Culture in the Mature and Late phases with major urban centers and locations:(1) Mehrgarh,(2) Amri, (3) Kotdiji, (4) Harappa, (5) Mohenjodaro,(6) Lothal, (7) Dholavira (8) Kalibangan,(9) Ganweriwala, and (10) Pirak (based on Mcintosh 2007 and Possehl 2002.
